title: 94/646/EC: Council Decision of 19 September 1994 on the conclusion of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol defining for the period 3 May 1994 to 2 May 1996 the fishing possibilities and financial compensation provided for in the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the People's Republic of Angola on fishing off Angola
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 19 September 1994 on the conclusion of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol defining for the period 3 May 1994 to 2 May 1996 the fishing possibilities and financial  compensation provided for in the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the People's Republic of Angola on fishing off Angola (94/646/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol defining for the period 3 May 1994 to 2 May 1996, the fishing possibilities and financial compensation provided for in the Agreement between  the European Economic Community and the Government of the People's Republic of Angola on fishing off Angola is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the persons empowered to sign the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 September 1994.
For the Council
The President
J. BORCHERT
(1) OJ No L 341, 3. 12. 1987, p. 1.
